title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Classic Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce, homemade croutons, and parmesan cheese tossed in creamy Caesar dressing.

title: Beef Wellington
summary: Tender beef fillet wrapped in mushroom duxelles, prosciutto, and golden puff pastry.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: Fresh seasonal vegetables stir-fried with ginger, garlic, and soy sauce.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served warm.
